items.item_details:
Background and Analysis:
	 
Governmental Accounting Standards Board (GASB) Statement No. 68 – Accounting and Financial Reporting for Pensions was effective for the fiscal year ending June 30, 2015.  Due to delayed reporting by CalSTRS and CalPERS in meeting GASB Statement No. 68 requirements, the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Annual Audit was not presented to the Board at the December Board meeting.
	 
Vavrinek, Trine, Day, & Company, LLP, Certified Public Accountants, located in Pleasanton, California, is working to complete the Foothill-De Anza Community College District annual audit for the year ended June 30, 2015 in time to present it to the Board of Trustees for acceptance at their regularly scheduled Board meeting of January 11, 2016.
	 
Therefore, the Measure C Performance Audit and Financial Audit will not be available until the January 11th Board of Trustees meeting.  A link will be emailed to the CBOC members at the same time the Board Packet is made available to the Board of Trustees.
	 
The committee will need to consider rescheduling their regular March meeting to an earlier date in February, in order to be in compliance with the Citizens' Bond Oversight Committee Bylaws governing the presentation of the Annual Report.
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Kevin McElroy, Vice Chancellor, Business Services, x6202
Additional contact names:
 Hector Quinonez, Executive Director, Fiscal Services, x6250
Is backup provided?
 Yes

Background and Analysis:
	 
Attached please find the following reports for the period from inception through September 30, 2015:
	 
1)  CBOC Quarterly Summary Report (7 pages)
	 
2)  Capital Projects Update - Measure C Whole Program with the Project Update by Category (7 pages)
	 
These reports give an overview of spending on a per project and program basis. The reports reflect funding sources (including earned interest), actual expenses to date and accruals posted for fiscal year end close.
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Steven Kitchen, Executive Director, Facilities & Operations, x6150
Additional contact names:
 Irina Thornton
Is backup provided?
 Yes

Background and Analysis:
	 
There were two Measure C Bond List Revisions during the reporting period ending September 30, 2015.  One of these revisions was reported upon at the last meeting of the committee and is reflected in the Financial Reports.  The second revision will be reported upon at this meeting of the committee.
	 
There was one Measure C Bond List Revision that occurred after the reporting period ending September 30, 2015, and prior to this meeting.  This revision took place at the following Board of Trustees' Meeting and is reflected in the attached Summary Report:
October 5, 2015
The Bond List Revision Summary Report and the associated back-up from the Board of Trustee meetings approving each revision is attached.
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Steven Kitchen, Executive Director, Facilities & Operations, x6150
Additional contact names:
 Irina Thornton
Is backup provided?
 Yes
